Description.Text: Prestige Hotel is in the old city center of Istanbul, close to touristic, business,entertainment and shopping areas. This is an ideal location for tourists as they can reach easily to the most famous historical and cultural places like Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, Saint Sophia Museum, Blue Mosque, Underground Cistern, Turkish and Islamic Arts Museum.,etc. The hotels's aim is to make your stay in Istanbul memorable, comfortable and above all, relaxed. Enjoy your visit. Located in Laleli-Beyazit, the oldest shopping center of Istanbul, since 1989, Prestige Hotel makes its customers experience a comfortable accommodation with its new concept, unique quality and service. Remark: Any extra charges other than the room rate made by the customer (minibar, lobby bar, restaurant,telephone etc.) will be collected from the customer at check-out. The hotel can arrange an one way or two way transfer to the customers if they wish with extra cost unless advertised otherwise.

Prestige Hotel is only walking distance to all amazing historical places, like Covered Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia Museum, Blue Mosque, Underground Cistern. It's only 2 km away from the city center, 100m away from the nearest tram station (Laleli-University stop) and 800m away from the nearest metro station (Aksaray stop) and 2 km away from the nearest main railway station (Sirkeci Station).

Twin Room - This 'Twin room' offers two twin beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, LCD TV, hairdryer, heating, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, telephone and bathtub. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones.
Connection Room - This 'Family Room' offers one king bed and two twin beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, LCD TV, hairdryer, heating, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, telephone and bathtub. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones.
Single Room - This 'Single Room' offers one twin or one king size bed with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, LCD TV, hairdryer, heating, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, telephone and bathtub. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones.
Double Room - This 'Double room' offers one king size bed with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, LCD TV, hairdryer, heating, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, telephone and bathtub. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones.
Triple Room - This 'Triple Room' offers three twin beds or one king bed and two twin beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, LCD TV, hairdryer, heating, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, telephone and bathtub. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones.
